name: Witchinder
description:
Before new year's eve, a young witch, Luise, is rushing to prepare a bunch of potions for her friends and family, help her, or she will turn you into an ugly toad, big bird, or pigeon. Check Recipe before putting anything in your pot, it might explode and kill you! Try not to make too many mistakes!

Controls

Swipe left / right OR Keyboard.LeftArrow / RightArrow OR in-game buttons, to skip/add the ingredient to your soup.
